name: “The Belt of Roland” Supercharger
effect: Pick one Main or larger weapon without the Reliable, Unreliable, or Overkill tags.  That weapon gains Reliable (4) and 1 Heat (Self).
description: A system of power cords and energy feeds designed to create more devastating blows, the Belt of Roland unfortunately shares a usual problem of G&S technology. It’s finicky about what you can hook it into, and once its hooked in, it’ll stress your mech’s reactor out... careful with it, okay?
